actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to provide that the trademark law does not require that each drug be manufactured in a tablet which is unique as to its size, color, and shape.

summary.text: Amends the Lanham Trade-Mark Act to state that it is not a false designation of origin or a false description or representation whenever a drug in tablet form is the same size, color, and shape as a tablet of another drug.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the trademark law does not require that each drug be manufactured in a tablet which is unique as to its size, color, and shape.
